name: Smoker (OP02-093)
effect: [DON!! x1] [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters 1 cost during this turn. Then, if there is a Character with a cost of 0, this Leader gains +1000 power during this turn.

effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

name: Helmeppo

name: Vergo

name: Brannew
effect: [On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 "Navy" type card other than [Brannew] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.

effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 black "Navy" type card from your hand: Up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less cannot attack until the end of your opponent's next turn.
